X.i.4.B.2.b
.
Termination of Service of the Philippine Commonwealth Army FromÂ the United States Army
On June 30, 1946, service of the Philippine Army in the United States Army was terminated by military order of the President of the United States, dated July 1, 1946.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B - Eligibility for Benefits Based on Philippines Service
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section B
